title: Here Are the States That Allow Same-day Voter Registration
description: Nearly half of U.S. states allow voters to register and cast ballots on Election Day.
dc:creator: Carly Olson

media:content.media:credit: Brittany Greeson for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: A woman fills out her ballot as her family waits outside during early voting in Lansing, Mich.
